r.s: Class for parsing and handling URL.
r.d: Provides parsing of URLs into their constituent parts (scheme, host, path etc.), URL generation, and resolving of relative URLs.
r.n: * Fixed Bug #17036: Problem with parsed query string * Fixed Bug #17087: setOption() function is gone * Fixed #17166: Fluent Interface * Fixed #17167: Refactor __construct * Fixed Bug #18267: setQueryVariables() fails to encode array values * Fixed Bug #14399: Fixed multiple bugs in Net_URL2 (Missing setOption value, unused properties, etc.)
